pkgmetadata.longdescription: An Interface to the 'Ravelry' API // Provides access to the 'Ravelry' API https://www.ravelry.com/groups/ravelry-api. An R wrapper for pulling data from 'Ravelry.com', an organizational tool for crocheters, knitters, spinners, and weavers. You can retrieve pattern, yarn, author, and shop information by search or by a given id.
